Texts.Chs: 当我使用变形球时，可以按下^orange;[S]^reset;投掷炸弹。
Texts.Eng: When you are in ball form, you can now drop bombs by pressing ^orange;down^reset;!

Texts.Chs: 通过对变形球内部的量子位移调节器做几个简单的调整，我或许可以让它更危险...
Texts.Eng: With a few simple tweaks to the quantum-displacement regulator used to make the Distortion Sphere work I could probably provide added deadliness...
